oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Broadside of Beautiful Jim Key's 1902 appearance in Rochester, New York
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Jim Key was a talented horse who was able to perform numerous tricks that showcased his intelligence and unique personality. His trainer, Dr. William Key, was an ex-slave who championed patience and kindness as the keys to successful horse training
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Beautiful Jim Key (Horse)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This broadside reads, "The Horse You Read About! Beautiful Jim Key - valued at $100,000 - The Celebrated Arabian-Hambletonian Educated Horse - First Appearance in Rochester - See His Marvelous Performance at Fitzhugh Hall."
